swsh.name: Slowbro
swsh.details: Even though there is a Galarian form that appears since version 1.1, the form from Kanto couldn't be transfered until Isle of Armor.

forms.name: slowbro
forms.details: Requires Galarica Cuff to be Assumed or Confirmed to be at least Guaranteed.
